Title: Senior Frontend Engineer - React.JS | Falabella | 3-6 years
Description:
About the Job
Falabella is one of Latin America’s leading integrated retailers with 560+ stores across 7 countries comprising department stores, home improvement, supermarkets, real estate, financial services, and travel. The specialist India team delivers IT business solutions to the Falabella Group. Join a group of passionate and driven individuals who are not just accelerating digital transformation in eCommerce, but also have the opportunity to shape their career.
We are looking for a JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. You will focus on developing user interfaces in React.js web environments, which interact with our users in a stable, intuitive and safe way. You will ensure these components are robust and easy to maintain. Connected with an existing data system that will be part of a new platform that is being developed for our various Ecommerce sites. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the platform and infrastructure, hence collaborative problem solving and quality product is very important.
Role & Responsibilities
Developing new use-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Support the developments until they are installed in production
Propose improvements in the solutions and tools
Apply the principles of design and architecture defined by the company
Refactoring of the existing components in the platform, according to the needs of the business
Ensuring design & implementation is efficient and high performance
Implement the automatic tests associated with the frontend layer, both integration and unit
Develop extensible and scalable solutions that could be used by other teams

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.

constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate adherence with Security and Compliance policies and procedures within Engineering service scope • Identify, evaluate and participate in the design and engineering around new and emerging technologies. backup and recovery methods in multiple computing environments. • Help to drive architectural improvements and standardization for the infrastructure environments, including choice of networking infrastructure, hardware, monitoring software and associated application infrastructure (e.g. web servers, application servers, and database servers) • Support the overall direction to the IAM functions across the organization, including areas such as Federation, Privileged Access Management, Authentication & Authorization, Security and Provisioning Identity Data.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!

Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders

Upholding meticulous quality standards

Tried experience within software development industry

Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools

Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills

Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time
Experience:
work: 4 years (Preferred)
total work: 4 years (Preferred)
Quality Assurance: 4 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Temporarily due to COVID-19

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.
As a global business, Refinitiv relies on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Therefore we seek hardworking, qualified employees in all our operations around the world-regardless of race, color, sex/gender, including pregnancy, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under country or local law. Title: Software Engineer
Company: Idea Entity Tech Solutions Private Limited
Description:
Job Summary
We are looking for a Software Test Engineer who possesses a passion to deliver quality with out of the box diagnose, work closely with developers, managers, network engineers and other stakeholders throughout the SDLC to map business requirements with high-class delivery quality and best practices in a long-term perspective.
Responsibilities and Duties
Good understanding and experience in testing concepts – STLC, metrics, defects life cycle.
Work closely with developers, project managers, network engineers and other stakeholders throughout the SDLC, executing test iterations, tracking / reporting results, troubleshooting and coordinating defect resolution.
Analyzing the requirements from client.
Design and create test conditions and scripts to address business and technical use cases.
Use existing tools and techniques to execute test cases and build/script new tools for performing testing/validation function.

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)

Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.

A fun and exciting work environment.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.

Title: Senior ReactUI Developer | Fortune 500 Convenience Store Com...
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a great JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js middleware (such as React Hooks or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.
Responsibilities
Developing new user-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of browsers and web-capable devices.
Develop new products/features for web that adhere to best practices
Define the technical requirements that are required to develop the product/feature
Architect and design the technical solution and implement the solution
Deliver a hybrid user experience to be easily portable between web and mobile.
Explore, assess and prototype new technologies to drive innovation and problem solving
Partner and collaborate with stakeholders and other technology teams
Identify and analyze open source/market solutions
Skills
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Hooks or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of ECMA-Script.
Must be hands on with all fundamental libraries and concepts to work a front-end application.
Experience with NoSQL data bases like Mongo DB.
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token, oAuth.
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Familiarity with git version control tool

Title: Senior Frontend Engineer - React.JS | Falabella | 3-6 years
Description:
About the Job
Falabella is one of Latin America’s leading integrated retailers with 560+ stores across 7 countries comprising department stores, home improvement, supermarkets, real estate, financial services, and travel. The specialist India team delivers IT business solutions to the Falabella Group. Join a group of passionate and driven individuals who are not just accelerating digital transformation in eCommerce, but also have the opportunity to shape their career.
We are looking for a JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. You will focus on developing user interfaces in React.js web environments, which interact with our users in a stable, intuitive and safe way. You will ensure these components are robust and easy to maintain. Connected with an existing data system that will be part of a new platform that is being developed for our various Ecommerce sites. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the platform and infrastructure, hence collaborative problem solving and quality product is very important.

Propose improvements in the solutions and tools
Apply the principles of design and architecture defined by the company

Ensuring design & implementation is efficient and high performance
Implement the automatic tests associated with the frontend layer, both integration and unit
Develop extensible and scalable solutions that could be used by other teams

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.

So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. Title: QA Engineer/ Drupal Developer
Description:
Contribute to or support aspects of planning, design, development and delivery of system solutions for a specific business or technology area, in alignment with design and architectural standards and business requirements. Capture, qualify and help prioritize new IT demand and ensure IT services provided to business are meeting service quality standards as per agreed SLAs.

-Represent IT to the business or IT groups receiving services, ensuring that expectations for IT services are met. -Identify and qualify new demand and assist with steering proposals through the early phases of approval; help establish budgets and investment proposals and obtain sponsorship and funding. -Ensure the introduction of new / modified services happens in a planned, controlled and timely manner to minimize disruption and maximize benefit. -Create the detailed IT solution/service design, based on functional specifications, to meet quality and performance requirements and technical constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate services horizontally across organizational units, and manage interfaces between Service Delivery projects. • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases • Develop, build, configure and unit test solutions from low level designs • Ensure that solutions meet requirements outlined in the design documentation • Perform all work to agreed time, cost and quality constraints • Ensure that developed solutions are peer reviewed and formally documented • Unit test solutions to ensure they meet quality standards • Develop within an Agile SDLC framework, including; estimation, design, development, unit test, code reviews, and documentation • Ensure delivered solutions satisfy business requirements as outlined in user stories, and within agreed upon timelines • Ensure solutions are of high-quality with regards to following standards and best practices, as well as satisfying security and performance requirements • Collaborate effectively with Agile team members to ensure a high-performance team environment • Work with Production Support team in the research and resolution of production issues.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs

Digital & Technology Savvy Organizational Savvy Project Excellence Continuous Learning (Dyn. Knowledge Development) Managing Change Interpersonal Savvy Being resilient
Minimum requirements
Collaborating across boundaries Cross Cultural Experience Organization Scope; Scale and Complexity Ambiguity Accountability English IT Data Analysis IT Systems Design Programming / Software development IT Systems Integration IT Service Level Management Consulting Supplier Relationship Management.

Education: Bachelor’s degree in business/technical area adequate equivalent Exp • At least 5 years of experience in Web technologies. • At least 2 years of experience in software quality assurance • At least 1 year Drupal development experience • Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills • Ability to build strong relationships and communicate with a breadth and variety of internal and external resources. • Ability to work with others in a high paced, fluid, multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary team • Ability to operate in a global organization • Serve as a Subject Matter Expert and thought leader • Management of resources (time/budget/people) within defined time parameters • Regular and close engagement with all stakeholders • Ensure that all Drupal products are developed to the same high standards in terms of time, cost and quality constraints Language • Must be able to fluently read, write, understand and communicate in English.

Job Purpose • Responsible for the creation and execution of tests to identify issues with software before the product launch to ensure the completed products meet Alcon’s high quality standards. • Develop, build, configure, customize, integrate and unit test Drupal solutions on Acquia Cloud Site Factory based on the functional and technical specifications which meet quality and performance requirements. • Collaborate with multiple stakeholders.

• Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes • Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases • Previous Drupal development experience required • HTML, JavaScript, CSS, PHP, and Drupal 8 development experience preferred • Acquia Cloud experience preferred • Acquia Cloud Site Factory experience preferred • Drupal certification is a bonus • Scrum or Agile methodology experience • Experience on Cloudflare,JIRA,Bitbucket,GitHub and Travis CI

Title: Senior PHP/Python Developer
Description:
Job Summary
actively looking for a self-driven senior PHP developer who can architect a scalable US-based application and build it from scratch to deployment.
Location
100% remote
Responsibilities and Duties
Primary Duties & Responsibilities:
Application Architecture Design: Recommending, designing and implementing the appropriate architecture and application design for multiple projects based on business case/problem analysis.
Business Analysis: Assist in defining and refining Architectural, Functional and System requirements based on business requirements.
Platform design evolution: Define transition steps from the current to the future state application architecture, including interoperability. Plans and manages upgrades for existing components (e.g. Drupal core and modules), and researches and implements new components (third-party application and/or contributed modules).
Solution architecture integrity: Participates in code reviews, security audits, and technical design approval.
System performance: Ensures all solution components are designed and implemented for optimal performance, defines and monitors key system metrics, performs load tests and works with internal and external resources to resolve bottlenecks.
Support: Provides second/third level support for system issues and tracks and works with vendors issues to resolve in a timely manner.
Code development: Defines and implements code management practices (e.g. continuous integration and development operations), develops modules as deemed appropriate and mentors internal resources on development tasks.
DevOps Mentor: Implement and utilize modern web development
workflows and development operations using tools such as Laravel homestead, DrupalVM, Vagrant, or BitBucket, GitHub preferred

Performs other duties as assigned.

6+ years of experience required in working with the following primary technologies in an enterprise environment: Laravel, Drupal 8, PHP 7, MySQL 5, Apache 2, HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, Version control systems (Git)
Familiarity with LAMP stack (SSH, command line tools, web server)
Understanding of HTTP request/response life cycle
Understanding of Content migration approaches and design
Understanding of various integration patterns, use of MQ buses, services module
Well versed with advanced PHP concepts
Comprehension of SQL queries and database design concepts
Hands-on experience on HTML5&CSS3
Proficient in Object-oriented JavaScript
JavaScript Design patterns is a plus
Modular & Scalable CSS architecture
Proficiency in using Git and related workflows for source control management
5+ years of experience desired in working with the following primary Platforms, Tools / Providers in an enterprise environment: Performance monitoring (New Relic, etc), Load testing tools (Blaze Meter, etc), Automated testing & deployment (Jenkins, BitBucket), Cloud (AWS, Rackspace)
Understanding of advance site performance optimization concepts i.e. identifying load times, memory usage, slow queries, setting up and manage various layers of caching mechanisms ex. Varnish/Memcache, changing cache layers and cache invalidation.
Work experience on Cloud infrastructure is preferred
Have worked on advance caching driven solutions
3rd party integrations understanding is a must
Experience in designing high performance, high availability systems
Experience in application analysis and design (OOA/D, Design Patterns, and SOA)
Ability to communicate software and system design architectures using tools like Visio and familiarity with UML
Experience in managing deployments with multiple developers across multiple environments
Understanding of W3C standards, Accessibility Standards, Security Guidelines and standards such as PCI, SOX, General Data Protection Regulation

Active in online communities (e.g., active on Drupal.org discussions, contributes to or maintains a public git project, has presented at one of the coding events, etc.)
Experience of handling a project with minimal oversight and direction
Working experience in multi-team environment

We are looking for a Software Engineer, who is an experienced Laravel & Angular Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic and maintenance of the central database and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely Laravel and JavaScript framework) and MySQL (understanding table type, query execution time, query optimization and so on).

Document the development process, architecture, and standard components

BTech/MCA/MSc

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time
Experience:
work: 4 years (Preferred)
total work: 4 years (Preferred)
Quality Assurance: 4 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Temporarily due to COVID-19

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.
As a global business, Refinitiv relies on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Therefore we seek hardworking, qualified employees in all our operations around the world-regardless of race, color, sex/gender, including pregnancy, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under country or local law. Title: Executive Assistant
Description:
We are looking for an organized and resourceful assistant to help with our administrative and operational tasks. You should be actively invested in building and improving communication processes, business processes, and overall workflows.
Ideally you’re looking for a long-term partnership where we both grow and thrive together for years to come
Job Role
Receiving and replying to all client enquiries via email and phone.
Tracking payments, building and maintaining a client database.
Coordinating between different departments. You must collect files from our nutritionist and ensure that the formatting is as per company brand standards. The file must then be combined with the exercise plan and sent to the client.
Client progress follow-up every 3-months, after which a new set of plans need to be emailed.
Handling and responding to all online communication generated through our website.
Feedback and customer care: Set standard procedures and practices to communicate with clients. Engage with them and take their feedback.
Build a strong team by hiring customer care executives, nutritionists and other roles that may be required as the company grows
Coordinating with the web developer when required for website maintenance, updates or issues.
Coordinating with the content production, social media marketing and digital marketing teams.
Requirements
First and foremost, you should be an efficient problem solver who is always looking to learn more.
You should be a native-level English writer and speaker with a knack for catching (and keeping) people’s attention.
You should be highly proficient with MS-Office, GSuite and or other office management softwares.
A keen interest in technology is very important for the progress of the company. You should know your way around the internet and learn new tools and techniques that can help us grow faster.
Familiarity with online products/ courses is a must, but you don’t have to be an expert.
Must have 1-2 years prior experience in administration and management, creation of SOPs.
Logistics
You will work from Mon-Friday, between the times of 9am and 6pm Indian Standard Time, as this is when we will collaborate most often.
You must be open to regular communication and consistent updates and availability.

Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Title: Video Maker/Editor, Graphic Designer
Description:
Job Summary
A digital marketer is responsible for developing, implementing and managing marketing campaigns that promote a company and its products and/or services. He or she will play a major role in enhancing brand awareness within the digital space as well as drivingwebsite traffic and acquiring leads/customers.
A video maker, editor needed to create videos as per the requirements of the company whenever asked for.
Responsibilities and Duties
Develop and manage digital marketing campaigns
Make marketing materials like videos, flyers, etc., as per the need.
Oversee a social media strategy
Manage and maintain the organisation’s website(s)
Write and optimize content for the website and social networking accounts such as Facebook and Twitter
Track and analyse website traffic flow and provide regular internal reports
Continually work on the Search Engine Optimization of the website(s)
Fix any errors or bugs in online content
Edit and post videos, podcasts and audio content to online sites
Arrange webinars and webcasts
Create online banner adverts and oversee pay per click (PPC) ad management
Write copy for email marketing campaigns
Identify new trends in digital marketing, evaluate new technologies and ensure the brand is at the forefront of industry developments, particularly developments in mobile marketing
Work on printed material to supplement online products
Attend product launches and networking events
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Experience: 1 year required
Skills Required:
Editing and writing skills: You need to devise and edit content for various digital platforms. Writing blog posts may well be an integral part of the job
Speaking skills: These will mainly be deployed internally. You will need to be able to explain coherently to others, who may not be familiar with the medium, how digital technologies work and what their marketing application is
Video editing skills: Website and social media content will not just be text but frequently visual as well
Web development skills: A digital marketing executive is not a software developer, but you will need sound knowledge of HTML/JavaScript, strong knowledge of search engine optimization and advanced Word and Power point skills
Project management skills: Digital marketing executives also need to be good at handling time-sensitive projects and working to deadlines
Education: B. Arts, D. Arts, or any Certified course in Digital Marketing or Video Making/Editing
Benefits
It gives you a great exposure to the IT industry as well as the healthcare sectors.
Platform to showcase your abilities and growth opportunities.
India’s first company to get recognition as most standard software solution provider by GSFDA and 6500+ active engagements
It is a challenging role which not only gives an exposure to sales and marketing but also develops your understanding of business fundamentals.
You can explore your creativity on the social media platforms.
Learning and growth opportunities.

Title: Senior Frontend Engineer - React.JS | Falabella | 3-6 years
Description:
About the Job
Falabella is one of Latin America’s leading integrated retailers with 560+ stores across 7 countries comprising department stores, home improvement, supermarkets, real estate, financial services, and travel. The specialist India team delivers IT business solutions to the Falabella Group. Join a group of passionate and driven individuals who are not just accelerating digital transformation in eCommerce, but also have the opportunity to shape their career.
We are looking for a JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. You will focus on developing user interfaces in React.js web environments, which interact with our users in a stable, intuitive and safe way. You will ensure these components are robust and easy to maintain. Connected with an existing data system that will be part of a new platform that is being developed for our various Ecommerce sites. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the platform and infrastructure, hence collaborative problem solving and quality product is very important.
Role & Responsibilities

Ensuring design & implementation is efficient and high performance
Implement the automatic tests associated with the frontend layer, both integration and unit
Develop extensible and scalable solutions that could be used by other teams

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.

So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. Title: QA Engineer/ Drupal Developer
Description:
Contribute to or support aspects of planning, design, development and delivery of system solutions for a specific business or technology area, in alignment with design and architectural standards and business requirements. Capture, qualify and help prioritize new IT demand and ensure IT services provided to business are meeting service quality standards as per agreed SLAs.

-Represent IT to the business or IT groups receiving services, ensuring that expectations for IT services are met. -Identify and qualify new demand and assist with steering proposals through the early phases of approval; help establish budgets and investment proposals and obtain sponsorship and funding. -Ensure the introduction of new / modified services happens in a planned, controlled and timely manner to minimize disruption and maximize benefit. -Create the detailed IT solution/service design, based on functional specifications, to meet quality and performance requirements and technical constraints. -Develop, build, configure, customize, and unit test solutions based on the functional and technical specifications to meet quality and performance requirements. -Work to integrate services horizontally across organizational units, and manage interfaces between Service Delivery projects. • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases • Develop, build, configure and unit test solutions from low level designs • Ensure that solutions meet requirements outlined in the design documentation • Perform all work to agreed time, cost and quality constraints • Ensure that developed solutions are peer reviewed and formally documented • Unit test solutions to ensure they meet quality standards • Develop within an Agile SDLC framework, including; estimation, design, development, unit test, code reviews, and documentation • Ensure delivered solutions satisfy business requirements as outlined in user stories, and within agreed upon timelines • Ensure solutions are of high-quality with regards to following standards and best practices, as well as satisfying security and performance requirements • Collaborate effectively with Agile team members to ensure a high-performance team environment • Work with Production Support team in the research and resolution of production issues.

- -Completeness and accuracy of business demand capture -Project/solution delivery execution (quality, time, cost) -Process efficiency -IT service risks recorded / managed -Customer Satisfaction -Service/solution quality: timely and accurate reporting (i.e. Service performance and CSAT analyze) -Adherence to solution architecture and architecture roadmaps -Adherence to SLAs

Digital & Technology Savvy Organizational Savvy Project Excellence Continuous Learning (Dyn. Knowledge Development) Managing Change Interpersonal Savvy Being resilient
Minimum requirements
Collaborating across boundaries Cross Cultural Experience Organization Scope; Scale and Complexity Ambiguity Accountability English IT Data Analysis IT Systems Design Programming / Software development IT Systems Integration IT Service Level Management Consulting Supplier Relationship Management.

Education: Bachelor’s degree in business/technical area adequate equivalent Exp • At least 5 years of experience in Web technologies. • At least 2 years of experience in software quality assurance • At least 1 year Drupal development experience • Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills • Ability to build strong relationships and communicate with a breadth and variety of internal and external resources. • Ability to work with others in a high paced, fluid, multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary team • Ability to operate in a global organization • Serve as a Subject Matter Expert and thought leader • Management of resources (time/budget/people) within defined time parameters • Regular and close engagement with all stakeholders • Ensure that all Drupal products are developed to the same high standards in terms of time, cost and quality constraints Language • Must be able to fluently read, write, understand and communicate in English.

Job Purpose • Responsible for the creation and execution of tests to identify issues with software before the product launch to ensure the completed products meet Alcon’s high quality standards. • Develop, build, configure, customize, integrate and unit test Drupal solutions on Acquia Cloud Site Factory based on the functional and technical specifications which meet quality and performance requirements. • Collaborate with multiple stakeholders.

• Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes • Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases • Previous Drupal development experience required • HTML, JavaScript, CSS, PHP, and Drupal 8 development experience preferred • Acquia Cloud experience preferred • Acquia Cloud Site Factory experience preferred • Drupal certification is a bonus • Scrum or Agile methodology experience • Experience on Cloudflare,JIRA,Bitbucket,GitHub and Travis CI

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

work: 4 years (Preferred)
total work: 4 years (Preferred)
Quality Assurance: 4 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Remotely:
Temporarily due to COVID-19

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.
As a global business, Refinitiv relies on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Therefore we seek hardworking, qualified employees in all our operations around the world-regardless of race, color, sex/gender, including pregnancy, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under country or local law. Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

We are looking for a Software Engineer, who is an experienced Laravel & Angular Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic and maintenance of the central database and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely Laravel and JavaScript framework) and MySQL (understanding table type, query execution time, query optimization and so on).

Adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
