Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development.
Client communication (verbal/written) as and when required.
Develop, record and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP applications on portal plus premium service platforms
Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team
Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications
Prepare and maintain all applications utilizing standard development tools
Utilize backend data services and contribute to increasing existing data services API
Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post-launch support
Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues
Document the development process, architecture, and standard components
*
Qualifications and Skills
BTech/MCA/MSc
Demonstrable experience with PHP including OOP, security, refactoring & design patterns.
Excellent knowledge of Laravel framework and experience building factories/facades/libraries using abstract classes, interfaces, traits.
MUST HAVE Experience in unit testing using testing frameworks like PHPUnit /PHPspec.
Good knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL/MS SQL/PostgreSQL), database designing and query optimization techniques.
Experience in NoSQL (MongoDB/DynamoDB) databases will be an added advantage.

MUST HAVE Experience in Angular Javascript Framework.
Hands-on experience in RESTful API design and development including implementation of oAuth2.0 for authentication and authorization
4+ years of Laravel work experience
1+ years of Angular work experience

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

Title: Senior ReactUI Developer | Fortune 500 Convenience Store Com...
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a great JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js middleware (such as React Hooks or Redux). You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.
Responsibilities
Developing new user-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of browsers and web-capable devices.
Develop new products/features for web that adhere to best practices
Define the technical requirements that are required to develop the product/feature
Architect and design the technical solution and implement the solution
Deliver a hybrid user experience to be easily portable between web and mobile.
Explore, assess and prototype new technologies to drive innovation and problem solving
Partner and collaborate with stakeholders and other technology teams
Identify and analyze open source/market solutions
Skills
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Hooks or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of ECMA-Script.
Must be hands on with all fundamental libraries and concepts to work a front-end application.
Experience with NoSQL data bases like Mongo DB.
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token, oAuth.
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Familiarity with git version control tool

Title: Senior Frontend Engineer - React.JS | Falabella | 3-6 years
Description:
About the Job
Falabella is one of Latin America’s leading integrated retailers with 560+ stores across 7 countries comprising department stores, home improvement, supermarkets, real estate, financial services, and travel. The specialist India team delivers IT business solutions to the Falabella Group. Join a group of passionate and driven individuals who are not just accelerating digital transformation in eCommerce, but also have the opportunity to shape their career.
We are looking for a JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.js. You will focus on developing user interfaces in React.js web environments, which interact with our users in a stable, intuitive and safe way. You will ensure these components are robust and easy to maintain. Connected with an existing data system that will be part of a new platform that is being developed for our various Ecommerce sites. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the platform and infrastructure, hence collaborative problem solving and quality product is very important.
Role & Responsibilities
Developing new use-facing features using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Support the developments until they are installed in production
Propose improvements in the solutions and tools
Apply the principles of design and architecture defined by the company
Refactoring of the existing components in the platform, according to the needs of the business
Ensuring design & implementation is efficient and high performance
Implement the automatic tests associated with the frontend layer, both integration and unit
Develop extensible and scalable solutions that could be used by other teams

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.

Title: Full Stack Developer (Laravel & Angular) - Kochi
Company: Talent Corner HR Services Pvt. Ltd.
Description:
Must HAVE 4+ years of Laravel, 1+ years of Angular experience.
Location: Kochi
We are looking for a Software Engineer, who is an experienced Laravel & Angular Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic and maintenance of the central database and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely Laravel and JavaScript framework) and MySQL (understanding table type, query execution time, query optimization and so on).
Responsibilities and Duties
Ensure effective Design, Development, Validation and Support activities in line with client needs and architectural requirements.
Ensure continual knowledge management.
Adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
Write clean, secure, test-driven, easily maintainable and modular codes.
Database designing and maintenance.
Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
Troubleshoot and debug applications.
Perform UI/backend tests to optimize performance.
Collaborate and work with mobile app developers on the backend needs of projects.
Adhere closely to development plans and anticipate changes to specification or schedule as they become necessary during development.
Work with project managers when gathering requirements, presenting work, etc. and be able to take complex technical terms and break them down into layman's terms.
Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development.
Client communication (verbal/written) as and when required.
Develop, record and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP applications on portal plus premium service platforms
Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team
Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications
Prepare and maintain all applications utilizing standard development tools
Utilize backend data services and contribute to increasing existing data services API
Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post-launch support
Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues
Document the development process, architecture, and standard components
*
Qualifications and Skills
BTech/MCA/MSc
Demonstrable experience with PHP including OOP, security, refactoring & design patterns.
Excellent knowledge of Laravel framework and experience building factories/facades/libraries using abstract classes, interfaces, traits.
MUST HAVE Experience in unit testing using testing frameworks like PHPUnit /PHPspec.
Good knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL/MS SQL/PostgreSQL), database designing and query optimization techniques.
Experience in NoSQL (MongoDB/DynamoDB) databases will be an added advantage.
Good core knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and Bootstrap framework.
MUST HAVE Experience in Angular Javascript Framework.
Hands-on experience in RESTful API design and development including implementation of oAuth2.0 for authentication and authorization
4+ years of Laravel work experience
1+ years of Angular work experience

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map

Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!

Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.

criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.

him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.

automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.

development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).

Title: Salesforce Developer
Description:
Our professionals balance analytical skills, deep market insight and independence to deliver solid, defensible analysis and practical advice to our clients. As an organization, we think globally. We create transparency in an opaque world, and we encourage our people to do the same. That means when you take your place on our team, you’ll discover a supportive and collaborative work environment that empowers you to excel. If you’re ready to share your perspective with the world, then you can make a real impact here. This is the Duff & Phelps difference.
At Duff & Phelps, your work will help protect, restore and maximize value for our clients. Join us and together we’ll maximize the value of your career.
Position Overview
Our Compliance Risk and Diligence practice needs a Salesforce.com Developer who is good at Apex, Visualforce and full SFDC project implementations, all in the ever-increasingly demand of a global business in the 21st century.
You’ll need to be self-motivated, a great communicator and deeply technical across the full stack. You’ll be working with the other developer and software QA teams in Hyderabad, and key stakeholders in USA, United Kingdom, India, Hong Kong, and elsewhere throughout the world.
As a team, we value integrity, honesty, consistency, and teamwork. We utilize modern best practices while respecting that legacy portions of the application are different.
Responsibilities:
Be a developer on certain projects and enhancements of high-complexity.
Develop an understanding of how the application works and how it is used.
Need a sense of how a feature “should” work without explicit requirements.
Convert functional specifications into technical solutions with minimal guidance.
Develop integration processes with external systems using APIs and web services including third-party integration tools.
Review code for potential performance, security, or reusability issues.
Review code to ensure that it meets the requirements, or of you see a “better way”.
Interact with the project owner, key stakeholders, QA, and other developers as needed.
Desire for self-improvement, both manager-led and self-identified.
Provide support to end users.
Troubleshoot and fix production issues.
Requirements:
Bachelors/Master’s Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
4+ years of experience in developing Salesforce platform using Apex, Visualforce, Triggers, Custom Controllers, Batch Apex and writing test classes.
Good knowledge of OOPS
Experience in tasks like User Creations, Roles, Profiles, Page Layouts, Email Services, Workflows, Validation rules, Custom objects/settings, reports and dashboards.
Strong knowledge in Salesforce.com standard functionality, features and Force.com Capabilities
Hands on experience in implementing Salesforce communities.
Develop custom code using Visualforce, APEX to build customized solutions, debugging skills and supporting business initiatives/processes.
Experience in Lightning, migration from Salesforce classic to Lightning would be preferable
Familiar with Deployment options like Change Sets, Force.com IDE
Experience in Apex Data loader for data load activities or familiar in related tools.
Knowledge in UI front ends with HTML, JavaScript and CSS/Bootstrap, experience in jQuery will be a plus
Ability to learn new things quickly and to understand the client's requirements
Knowledge with REST/ SOAP based web services and their integration with salesforce platform and SSO setup
Good understanding of Security Concepts, Governor limits & Best Practices on Force.com.
Strong analytical, problem solving, and troubleshooting skills
Nice to have:
Salesforce Platform Developer I or II (PDII – added advantage)
Working experience on versioning tools like SVN/GitHub, etc
Experience in Sales Cloud, Service Cloud
Knowledge on GoJS library
Experience on FusionCharts library or similar related to Data Visualization tools
In order to be considered for a position at Duff & Phelps, you must formally apply via careers.duffandphelps.jobs

Duff & Phelps is committed to equal opportunity and diversity, and recruits people based on merit.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!

Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders

Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

Title: Sr. Front End UI Developer - React
Description:
Izenda is seeking a Front-end Developer/Designer with a strong design mind to help drive our customer-facing application design and UI strategy. ).
Reporting into the development organization, the Front-End Developer/Designer is responsible for detailed application design, hands-on development and maintenance of the front-end of our application, our marketing experiences (as needed), and client-side application developer. You will also be responsible for Growth Marketing Initiatives surround he websites of our clients. The desire and ability to be client facing, manage multiple projects, and (eventually) manage a team of junior front-end staff is critical.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products
Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web application
Build our UI framework to help us create rich applications to interact with our data—code, widgets, and all—and help us identify and document its emergent rules
Work with Clients to make their design and UI dreams come to life via an elegant user experience and design.
Skills & Qualifications:
Hard skills—code: Fluent, and we mean fluent, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. You know jQuery but know why it’s insufficient. Experience with and full knowledge of how to use React and Node to build a full web app—back and front - would be ideal. Encyclopedic knowledge of browser and device compatibility. Wordpress knowledge is required as some client's marketing engines run on top of this.
Experience: Minimum 5 years developing and shipping clean, efficient, and compatible web apps, and executing with all the hard skills above
Portfolio: A portfolio of real projects—better yet if one or two are open source you can walk us through your work on GitHub
Training: Bachelor’s degree, ideally in a technical—Computer Science or Design. (In lieu of degree, 4 years of relevant work experience).
Soft skills: Demonstrated (in your portfolio) eye for design and solving real-world user problems. You are passionate, kind, and have a good sense of humor. You are a talker and a white border, and unafraid to step into a leadership role
Good To Have:
Good understanding of the relevant design software: Adobe Photoshop, Invision Studio, Sketch.
In-depth understanding of one or more of the various Front End Frameworks used : Bootstrap, Angular, React, OJET, Java-script.Photographic and Image creation and manipulationExperience of Interactive prototyping tools like Invision
AppDesign for Mobile DevicesResponsive Design Techniques.
Motion and Animation skills are good to have.Very knowledgeable of technical constraints and possibilities from a Front End Development perspective. (eg: what is possible, what is hard to do, what are the different frameworks used)

journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).

We are looking for a Software Engineer, who is an experienced Laravel & Angular Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic and maintenance of the central database and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely Laravel and JavaScript framework) and MySQL (understanding table type, query execution time, query optimization and so on).

Ensure continual knowledge management.
Adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
Write clean, secure, test-driven, easily maintainable and modular codes.

Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
Troubleshoot and debug applications.

Work with project managers when gathering requirements, presenting work, etc. and be able to take complex technical terms and break them down into layman's terms.
Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development.
Client communication (verbal/written) as and when required.
Develop, record and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP applications on portal plus premium service platforms
Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team
Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications
Prepare and maintain all applications utilizing standard development tools
Utilize backend data services and contribute to increasing existing data services API
Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post-launch support
Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues
Document the development process, architecture, and standard components
*
Qualifications and Skills
BTech/MCA/MSc
Demonstrable experience with PHP including OOP, security, refactoring & design patterns.
Excellent knowledge of Laravel framework and experience building factories/facades/libraries using abstract classes, interfaces, traits.
MUST HAVE Experience in unit testing using testing frameworks like PHPUnit /PHPspec.
Good knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL/MS SQL/PostgreSQL), database designing and query optimization techniques.
Experience in NoSQL (MongoDB/DynamoDB) databases will be an added advantage.
Good core knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and Bootstrap framework.
MUST HAVE Experience in Angular Javascript Framework.
Hands-on experience in RESTful API design and development including implementation of oAuth2.0 for authentication and authorization
4+ years of Laravel work experience
1+ years of Angular work experience
AWS Experience will be an added advantage.

Title: Product Developer
Description:
Role Overview:
Signant Health innovates at the leading-edge of clinical research data, one exceptional service at a time. From the advanced technology of our eCOA electronic Clinical Outcomes Assessments flexible platform, to the efficiency of our scalable and configurable Randomization and Trial Supply Management (RTSM) Clinical IRT solution, to our science-focused Rater Training and Quality Assurance programs, Signant does it faster, better and with an eye on the future of our industry.

If you’re looking for a growing company with delighted customers, a dedication to superb products designed with the patient in mind, and a management team that allows you to make your mark on how the company evolves, we want to hear from you.

We are:
A company that offers a unique suite of solutions, with a unique perspective on clinical research development
Focused on bringing together best-in-class science, technology and service to drive superior clinical outcome results for our clients and for their patients
At the leading-edge of clinical research data, one exceptional service at a time
Experienced and have implemented over 250 studies in more than 80 countries
A company that takes great care to maintain our culture and ensure that each new team member enhances that culture

Ready to work in an inspiring team environment with an open communication culture
Creative and innovative
A detail-oriented problem solver who delights in adding value to products and their roadmap

We are seeking an exceptional candidate to lead and produce software for our team.

This role will require an experienced Product Developer ready to play a key part in our software development efforts, interfacing directly with the engineering, product testing and product management teams to ensure superb-quality development and deployments of software enhancements. As a Product Developer, you will learn our innovative software suite from the inside out. You will grow both technically and increase your product knowledge. At a medium sized company, you will see the impact of your work daily as part of our rapid release schedule.

We pride ourselves on the quality of our systems and our ability to evolve products to anticipate client needs. As a Product Developer, you’ll combine organizational skills, familiarity with software development, and a keen detail orientation to help ensure we settle for nothing less than the highest standards.

Help drive the successful completion of development projects

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.

Title: Senior React Native developer
Description:
Please, apply only if you are very skilled since this position requires you to perform a thorough code challenge and multiple live interviews. Apply only if you can get into a new job within 1 week.
You are someone who is well-organized, resourceful, flexible, has the ability to multitask, and has extraordinary attention to detail. You must have strong communication skills and the ability to develop strong working relationships with internal and external resources. A willingness to take ownership and work independently under tight deadlines.
Reasoning Skills
This role will need to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete or abstract variables in situations where only limited standardization exists. Must be able to interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram, or schedule form.
Other Skills and Abilities
Ability to work effectively and efficiently without supervision while utilizing time management and multi-tasking skills is required. Must be able to remain calm in stressful situations in order to leverage a patient and methodical approach. This role also needs to be self-motivated to learn and seek out new information in a rapidly changing environment.
Requirements:
Hands-on experience with React Native (2+ years).
Experience with popular React workflows (such as Flux or Redux).
Passion about complex, interactive applications with a thoughtful UX/UI.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
Thorough understanding of React and its core principles
Expertise in JavaScript (ES6).
Docker, Kubernetes.
GraphQL, CoreData.
4+ years professional mobile development experience.
Strong understanding of iOS/Android app development and releasing on App Store and Google Play.
Track record of shipping and maintaining large scale iOS apps.
Knowledge of professional engineering best practices.
Collaborative attitude and experience working with cross-functional teams.
Proven ability to take initiative and execute using agile techniques.
Learning mentality and excitement to solve complex problems.
Stickler for high-quality code and clean architecture.
Good communication skills and creative thinking.
Attention to detail and good product sense.
Skills writing and maintaining tests at all levels of the testing pyramid (Jest, Mocka etc.,).
Proficient in building cross platform native applications with React Native Framework.
Experience with common front end build tools.
Understanding of object-oriented design, client-server architecture and relational database design.
Experience with multithreading, memory management and caching mechanisms specific to mobile devices.
Experience writing up relevant Unit & Integration Tests.
Experience in benchmarking and optimizing the app for best performance across different devices.
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token.
A deep understanding of the importance of building maintainable, efficient, clean code, while balancing the urgency of business needs.
Familiar with JIRA and GitFlow.
To be considered for this role:
Please, schedule a time/day that you can spend a total of 2 hours interviewing. There is a 1 hour questions around technology and architecture. The interview is live and includes a live code challenge (max 1 hour, depending upon experience).

Title: Sr. Front End UI Developer - React
Description:
Izenda is seeking a Front-end Developer/Designer with a strong design mind to help drive our customer-facing application design and UI strategy. ).
Reporting into the development organization, the Front-End Developer/Designer is responsible for detailed application design, hands-on development and maintenance of the front-end of our application, our marketing experiences (as needed), and client-side application developer. You will also be responsible for Growth Marketing Initiatives surround he websites of our clients. The desire and ability to be client facing, manage multiple projects, and (eventually) manage a team of junior front-end staff is critical.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products
Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web application
Build our UI framework to help us create rich applications to interact with our data—code, widgets, and all—and help us identify and document its emergent rules
Work with Clients to make their design and UI dreams come to life via an elegant user experience and design.
Skills & Qualifications:
Hard skills—code: Fluent, and we mean fluent, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. You know jQuery but know why it’s insufficient. Experience with and full knowledge of how to use React and Node to build a full web app—back and front - would be ideal. Encyclopedic knowledge of browser and device compatibility. Wordpress knowledge is required as some client's marketing engines run on top of this.
Experience: Minimum 5 years developing and shipping clean, efficient, and compatible web apps, and executing with all the hard skills above
Portfolio: A portfolio of real projects—better yet if one or two are open source you can walk us through your work on GitHub
Training: Bachelor’s degree, ideally in a technical—Computer Science or Design. (In lieu of degree, 4 years of relevant work experience).
Soft skills: Demonstrated (in your portfolio) eye for design and solving real-world user problems. You are passionate, kind, and have a good sense of humor. You are a talker and a white border, and unafraid to step into a leadership role
Good To Have:
Good understanding of the relevant design software: Adobe Photoshop, Invision Studio, Sketch.
In-depth understanding of one or more of the various Front End Frameworks used : Bootstrap, Angular, React, OJET, Java-script.Photographic and Image creation and manipulationExperience of Interactive prototyping tools like Invision
AppDesign for Mobile DevicesResponsive Design Techniques.
Motion and Animation skills are good to have.Very knowledgeable of technical constraints and possibilities from a Front End Development perspective. (eg: what is possible, what is hard to do, what are the different frameworks used)

Title: QA Engineer Position in a product Based Company
Description:
About Us
Educating everyone, everywhere.
Shaw Academy is the largest live experience online educator in the world, making the highest quality, practical education accessible to all. Our focus is on live education because it is interactive, engaging, always evolving and most importantly, better for learning.
A Shaw Academy education empowers those seeking employment or those looking to further themselves in their career. We favour teaching tangible, professional, practical skills over theoretical concepts; skills which are currently shaping the theory that will be considered the norm in the years to come. We are truly playing a leading role in the future of education. We constantly refine and improve our courses, in real time, so the webinars you attend today will give you the most up to date, relevant and best learning experience on the planet. This is our EdTech Revolution.
Our Mission – Delivering great education, accessibly and affordably, to everyone. To empower individuals with the skills they need and follow any career path they seek. With a flexible education model, practical skills & global qualifications, our students are positioned for jobs, entrepreneurship, career changes & competence in the real world. Shaw Academy’s personalised education makes learning an integral part of life.!
Job Summary:
Shaw Academy is seeking a Senior QA Engineer to be a leader for our student and a guardian of their
journey
*
The Role:
In the Product Development team, we work in small, cross-functional, product focused, agile teams
where everyone is involved in the complete life cycle of a software product.
We are trying to be as lean and as agile as possible in all aspects of what we do.
We believe in the build-measure-learn product development loop and continuously deliver our
features in smallest valuable chunks.
We want to release multiple times each day and continuously improve our technical platform and
delivery process to be able to release more often.
Work in an agile team of 5-7 software developers, QA engineers and product owners.
Work within a development team and with stakeholders to define feature/projects acceptance
criteria.
Define testing strategy for features and product changes.
Extend automated testing suites to continually improve automated test coverage and coordinate
with developers to improve unit and integration tests.
Perform manual exploratory testing and regression testing if required (as defined by the QA
him/herself).
Work across other teams with other QA engineers on improve the overall testing strategy and
Continuous Delivery process.
What you’ll bring to the team:
Total 4+ years’ experience in Testing.
A proven track record of QA/Testing in a technology-led company preferably working on web-based
systems.
Experience working in Agile environment, ideally with Kanban and with continuous integration.
Strong Experience in API Testing using any of the tools like Postman, SOAPUI, REST Assured etc.
Experience or working knowledge of writing UI automated tests using any of the open source
automation tools like Selenium Web Driver.
Good exposure to Database concepts.
Experience with version control tools, (Git, SVN).
Degree in a discipline which requires application of analysis skills (e.g. engineering, software
development, computer sciences).
Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle (Jira, BaseCamp, Bugzilla etc.).
Location: Bangalore (Whitefield)
What we’ll provide:
Competitive Salary
Monthly bonus structure.
Our full range of award-winning educational courses – www.shawacademy.com
A fun and exciting work environment.
A once in a lifetime opportunity to change the world of education forever by joining our rapidly expanding technology-based firm with a foundation of real talent, and work with real innovators whilst achieving your own goals.
*

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Refinitiv offers a wide range of trading services, including market leading solutions in FX and other asset classes. Market leading workflow automation is enabled by strong technology integration and focus on customer service excellence! Security is at the heart of all that we do, underpinning the trust that is essential to markets.
As a Senior Software Engineer, you'll join our Trading Tools team. Our Trading Tools enable smooth operations for our colleagues and rapid resolutions for customers. Trading Tools cover complex workflows including straight-through-processing, involving products in multiple asset classes, displaying visualizations that allow insight, and powerful levers for action.
We are seeking a highly motivated developer with experience in an assortment of technologies including database, in-memory cache, web GUI, data visualization, Java and web services. As a part of our development team, you will work as part of the wider group launching new trading capabilities with new smart support tools as well as extending tools based on the evolving needs of the business.
If this is starting to sound exciting, we'd love to hear from you!
Role Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for the software design/development of Trading Tools and responsibilities will include:
Contribute to an Agile planning process
Regularly interacting directly with stakeholders
Working closely with senior technical specialists and architects
Crafting and document software design specifications
Giving demos of new functionality
Upholding meticulous quality standards
Perform Unit and Integration testing of your code
Undertake a 3rd line support role
Working with 3rd parties to help deliver the road map
Skills and Experience Required
Tried experience within software development industry
Knowledge of the financial world, trading workflows and technology
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or any other related fields
Strong software design and implementation. Solid experience in Java and programming & scripting languages (eg. Python, JavaScript), software engineering methodologies and software development tools
Git and Continuous Integration technologies, Jenkins, Bamboo
Database technology experience (Oracle, Postgres), cache technologies (Elastic Search)
Experience with Linux operating systems, including shell scripting and basic system administration
Strong trouble shooting and software debugging skills
Understanding of Agile process
Can work independently with minimal direction
Passion to learn and apply new technologies
Ability to work and communicate in a multinational environment
Written and oral English
Optimistic and forward-thinking
We're building a community of extraordinary people who will break new barriers and redefine what data can do. If you're relentlessly focused on delivering success, you could join them.
Amazing benefits? Of course.
We support our colleagues' health and wellbeing with inclusive benefits. So that's support for physical, financial, mental and environmental health, paid time off to volunteer, consumer discounts & savings and so much more. All of which are tailored to your needs and may vary by location. For more details talk to your recruiter.
As a global business, Refinitiv relies on diversity of culture and thought to deliver on our goals. Therefore we seek hardworking, qualified employees in all our operations around the world-regardless of race, color, sex/gender, including pregnancy, gender identity and expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, age, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under country or local law. Refinitiv is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer providing a drug-free workplace.
Refinitiv makes reasonable accommodations for applicants and employees with disabilities. If an accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please contact us to request an accommodation. A full list of our office locations and contact information can be found at: Refinitiv Office Locations.
